entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 7:24PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HEAVY RAIN TUESDAY AFTERNOON AND WEDNESDAY... A quick moving but moist atmospheric river has started to move across the area and is expected to persist into Wednesday evening. Streams and rivers will rise rapidly but at this time are expected to remain within their banks. Rain amounts will range from 1.50 to 3 inches with locally higher amounts. Some daily rainfall records will
